name: Sinking Town
description:
Sinking Town is an adventure game where you play as robot fella by the name of Cranky Burns, who tries to save his robotown from sinking and rusting underwater. Robots don’t aknowledge any currency aside from powerful roboparts and so Cranky will have to trade parts of his body for other bodyparts to unlock new abilities.

This game was made in 72 hours during Ludum Dare 44 with the theme "Your life is currency". In this game you trade with your robotic bodyparts and for the robots their life is in their parts.

Credits

Leonid Dudakov (@DetectiveLosos) - programming, art, vfx

Natalia Volkova (@Natashius) - art, level design

Annie Owl (@owl_annie) - programming

Problemke (@morel_8ight) - music
